abstract: Gov. Rick Perry was more subdued on Tuesday night than in past debates, and at times he crossed to soporific.
snippet: Gov. Rick Perry was more subdued on Tuesday night than in past debates, and at times he crossed to soporific.
lead_paragraph: The consensus view is that Tuesday was another poor debate for Gov. Rick Perry -- and an effective one for Mitt Romney.

headline.main: A Slow but Unsteady Debate for Perry
